text: Bartosz Łeszyk (born 4 December 1980 in Poznań) is a Polish futsal player who plays for Akademia Futsal Club. He has represented the Poland national futsal team multiple times, including qualifying matches for the 2007 UEFA Futsal Championship. He has also played 11-a-side football for Warta Poznań and Lechita Kłecko in Poland. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male futsal players Category:Sportspeople from Poznań
title: Bartosz Łeszyk
